channel.title: People can not connect to my server plz help
channel.description: can someone plz help i have done everything i have download no-ip utorrine and i prot fowarded my router everything i have my server running put i can only log in plz someone help

item.title: People can not connect to my server plz help
item.dc:creator: @AsianTony4 AsianTony4
item.description:
@AsianTony4 wrote:

Youve post this SEVERAL TIMES ALREADY just post it once and wait for people to answer. If not then search for it on google and other websites like rune locus or rune org.

Make sure your no-ip host is running.

CHECK AGAIN WITH port fowarding, because wrong ip means no one can access. It happened to me.

Lastly ALLOW port 43594 to run pass firewall. If not then no one can log into your server. If you need help with any of the steps above pm me a message.

Read full topic
item.source: People can not connect to my server plz help

ok make sure you let the port 43594 go through the firewall so they can login
